explains: adj. 独特的，与众不同的
wordGroup: distinctive feature 辨别属性；区别性特征

sentences.en: Chick peas have a distinctive, delicious, and nutty flavour.
sentences.cn: 鹰嘴豆有独特可口的坚果味。

sentences.en: When Miles Davis died jazz was robbed of its most distinctive voice.
sentences.cn: 当迈尔斯•戴维斯去世时，爵士乐里最具特色的声音也被夺走了。

sentences.en: A brand store has become famous for its distinctive scent.
sentences.cn: 这家名牌商店因其独特的香味而出名。
